review: It's nice. I would recommend it to friends. It needs more free apps though, seems that each app wants some kind of fee.

review: Easy to set up. Works great.
author: Jeannine Porter

review: I bought this product for my frequent travel.  I discovered that because most hotel wireless networks require you to sign in from a browser,  there is no way to put it on their network.  If they put a browser app on this that has the ability to be redirected to network sign in pages this product would be 5 stars plus.
author: Austin

review: Not really sold in it yet. Have had it a couple months.
author: Robert Rock

review: I have really enjoyed the Fire TV Stick.  It was a nice surprise and exceeded my expectations.  It took 5 minutes to set up and have enjoyed it as much as my Apple TV.  It's a great buy for the money.
author: Eunice Patton
